channel.title: Letter on Liu Qiran
channel.description: Recent content in Letter on Liu Qiran

item.title: Reply to Chris
item.description:
Chris:
I definitely know Austria.
You can find out more about me on my personal website. By the way, why not leave a footprint there?

It’s great that you’re interested in learning a language. It’s a long way for learning something.

Yes, it is. I’m Qiran. Nice to meet you!

Qiran
